Item.Description: LG. BURMESE LAVENDER & GR JADE BANGLE BRANGLE Description: Details: YOU ARE BIDDING ON A VERY FINE "A" QUALITY BURMESE LAVENDER AND GREEN JADE BANGLE BRACELET. THIS JADE BANGLE IS PERFECT!! 100% NATURAL BURMESE JADE COLOR (NO DYE), GOOD TRANSLUCENT QUALITY, AND THERE ARE NO FLAWS OR FRACTURES THROUGHOUT. THE BANGLE IS JUST STUNNING IN EVERY WAY AND EVEN THOUGH THE PICTURE HERE IS A GOOD ONE BUT IT STILL CANNOT DO THE ITEM ANY JUSTICE TO THE GORGEOUS COLORS. THE SIZE IS 2 1/2 INCHES ID. THIS BURMESE JADE BANGLE SHOULD RETAIL FOR ABOUT $450.00 OR MORE IN ANY GOOD JEWELRY STORE THAT SELLS FINE JADE. I HAVE ABOUT 15 OF THESE BANGLES ALL CUT FROM THE SAME STONE AND WILL BE USING THIS PICTURE FOR ALL SINCE THEY ARE VERY MUCH ALIKE, MOST WILL HAVE THREE GREEN SPOTS LIKE THE PICTURE AND JUST A FEW HAVE ONLY TWO GREEN SPOTS. OTHER THAN THAT THEY ARE THE SAME IN COLOR AND QUALITY AND SIZE. THISIS YOUR CHANCE TO OWN A VERY FINE PERFECT BURMESE LAVENDER JADE BANGLE AT A FRACTION OF THE TRUE RETAIL PRICE If you have any questions about Jade Grade's or qualities, I will be happy to e mail you back with anwers to any of your questions regarding this subject & what they mean. It is also worth bearing in mind when buying Jade that somewhere in the region of 85% of the Jade sold in the retail jewelry stores are treated in some way whether they tell you or NOT, indeed even if they know it themselfs !! It has been my personal experience that most jeweler's have very little or no knowledge at all about Jade, even though they say they do. I have been a direct importer of fine Jade jewelry for over ten years now, I personally travel to Burma, Thailand, & China to hand pick all my Jade items for sale. It has taken me years to know the grades and differant qualities of Jade, and I have learned from the old masters in the orient, not in some classroom. Thanks for your time and I hope I can be of some help to any of my customer's. I NOW ACCEPT VISA AND MASTERCARD PAYMENT THROUGH PAYPAL.COM. IT IS FREE, FAST, EASY AND VERY SECURE. BID WITH CONFIDENCE BECAUSE ALL DESCRIPTIONS ARE 100% ACCURATE AND ALL ITEMS ARE 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED ALSO PLEASE VISIT MY JADE WEBSITE AT - WWW.ORIENTALJADE JEWELRY.COM

Item.Name: Mens Men Armani Exchange A/X coat jacket L
Item.Description: This is an excellent condition Armani Exchange A/X navy wool pea coat in size large which is slightly a longer length than a bomber jacket. (Car Coat length). It is made of a heavy wool. It is a beautiful fall/winter color and just a true classic. Note that it has four patch pockets in the front with snap closures, and there is a small midline vent in the back. Made of the typical urban materials signature of Armani Exchange. The jacket is fully lined and there is padding also. Beautiful winter/fall/early spring coat which you can wear with literally ANYTHING! The lining of the jacket is 54% acetate/46% nylon, and the padding (filling of the jacket) is 100% polyester. The shell of the jacket (the part which is on the outside is 80%wool/20% nylon. The added nylon to the shell is VERY helpful because it prevents the wool from pilling into furballs. Any flaws seen in the photos are due solely to the resolution of the digital camera. All buttons are intact!. I purchased this jacket from A/X for about $200. The measurements of the jacket: Armpit to armpit across the chest = 24.5inches; bottom of the collar to end of the jacket = 35 inches in length. Great bargain! Goes nicely with black or grey or even khakis. I accept money order or Paypal only. Please email seller with any additional questions. Lucky bidder pays an additional $8.00 for 2nd day priority shipping with delivery confirmation. No reserve!

Over 500 styles of ties now in stock plus many more great items! Click here to visit! Your item is packed securely and shipped via USPS in most cases. You have the option of purchasing insurance if you desire it.Standard USPS rates (as of January 2001)are $1.10 up to $50, $2.00 from $50.01 to $100. Sorry, but we cannot be responsible for lost or damaged packages once they leave our possession unless they have been insured. You will not be disappointed! If for any reason you are not happy with your purchase, return it to us within ten days for a refund of your purchase price. Sorry, we do not refund shipping amounts. After The Sale We will usually contact you within 24 hours or less of the sale with payment information. Payment is expected to reach us within 10 days after the sale. We do leave feedback for our buyers on all transactions. Buyers outside the USA are responsible for all customs charges which may be incurred as a result of your merchandise purchase. Illinois buyers will need to add 7.25% sales tax. Payment Information We will be happy to accept your personal check and ship at once on any purchase up to $30 up to $75 if your feedback rating is at least 25 Checks should be imprinted with your address information. For purchases outside these parameters we accept money orders, bank checks and credit card payments via PayPal BidPay Billpoint PayPal payments should be sent to Mike@greattie.com Payment is to be made in US Dollars only on all items. HOLIDAY SHIPPING OPTIONS FOR THE USA We ship almost everything using the US Post Office. If the shipping charge stated is less than $3.50, the item is shipped via first class mail which is normally 2 to 4 days to anywhere in the USA. There is no delivery confirmation available on this and packages in rare instances have taken up to two weeks to arrive (way less than 1% of the time). Past history in shipping tells us that the Post Office actually does a very good job in December, yet with the volume of mail they process, packages do sometimes get misrouted. All items with a stated shipping charge of $3.50 or more are already shipped via priority mail, most with a delivery confirmation. Priority mail shipping with a delivery confirmation number sent to you is available on any item we sell where the shipping charge is stated at under $3.50. The cost for this is $4 and applies to the ties and most of the small ornaments that we are selling. If you want this service just submit $4 in place of any lower shipping amount stated and we will ship priority mail. Express mail overnight shipping is also available at a cost of $13.00 up to 8 ounces (single ties), 8 ounces to 2 pounds at $17 (most plates) and 2 to 3 pounds, $20. This is guaranteed overnight to most of the USA but may take two days to more rural areas. If you want to use this service have your payment in by noon CST or call me at 847-924-8744 and I will let you know if I will be able to get the item out that day. Any questions, feel free to call me at the number above. Please click here to see all of our auctions. This listing created by eBay Seller's Assistant Pro Visit Seasons2000 today! Item.Description: You'll be looking as good as gold when wearing this lovely gold satin evening shirt with button down front and pointy cuffs. UNITED STATES BIDDERS ONLY PLEASE! *HOW DO YOU KNOW IF THIS WILL FIT YOU?* SEE DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO MEASURE FOR FIT FOUND AT BOTTOM OF PAGE AS WELL AS MEASUREMENTS GIVEN BELOW! All bidders are asked to read the terms of service listed HERE . (Please click on "HERE" to read them) Bidding implies that you have read all the terms and agree to abide by them. Misunderstandings can often be prevented by taking this simple step prior to placing your bid for any auction item. I go to the post office and ship out in bulk once weekly, often twice weekly depending on volume. Please do not ask for SPECIAL DELIVERY as I cannot do time-sensitive shipping. After you pay for an auction, it will generally be shipped on the following post office day I have planned. In most cases where the outfit is sized too large for my mannequin excess fabric has been cinched behind the mannequin's back to simulate the proper fit of the garment. DO NOT GO BY THE PICTURES when thinking about fit issues, REFER TO THE MEASUREMENTS ONLY! See instructions at the bottom of this page for HOW TO DETERMINE FIT. I Accept Credit Card/Check Card Payments For My Auctions at the Following: SIZE INFORMATION...The return policy here at RHIANNON'S TREASURES is that all sales are final unless the item has been misrepresented, I am selling merchandise at well below retail in most cases (and often times even lower than clearance) and as such cannot absorb the cost of returned merchandise like department stores and high priced boutiques can do, so please familarize yourself with the correct method to use when determining a proper fit. The measurements I give you are with the garment laid flat and measured side to side, then I double that number to attain the total available room in the garment. The best way to compare is to take a garment that has a similar cut and/or style that you know fits you well and take those measurements with the garment lying on a flat surface (just as I am doing) and double that. BE SURE TO MEASURE THE BUST WAIST AND HIP AT THEIR ABSOLUTE MAXIMUM. Keep in mind that you need to be at least TWO inches smaller than the measurements I am giving in order to have a proper fit. Item.Name: GIRLS SIZE 4/4T HOUNDSTOOTH 2PC DRESS LIKE NW
Item.Description: This is a darling little 2pc dress set done in a stunning black and off-white houndstooth/gingham check pattern, a great "spectator" look. It includes a black mock-turtleneck style short-sleeve sweater which zips up the back and is separate from the dress so you can mix-n-match it with other items you own. The sleeves are slightly cuffed and on the center neck area there is an embroidered red heart to match the jumper's buttons. The jumper is in an adoreable gingham check/houndstooth-like pattern, deep scoop neck A-line style, and buttons up the back. There is solid black piping trim all the way around the bottom and some for detailing on the front of the dress. This style allows for a nice generous fit for long wearability. There are also little red heart buttons applied to the chest and faux pockets on the front for a "loving" touch! Wouldn't this be especially cute for Valentines Day?! But wear it now too, don't just save it for February! Made of a great medium weight fabric perfect for fall/winter weather and looks great with lightweight or thick tights and black patent shoes. My girls liked short sleeve sweaters because they always got too warm in Sunday school class--this is the perfect style. Unfortunately we moved to Hawaii before they really got a chance to wear this dress, it was maybe worn 1-2 times total so is in excellent condition. I also have a very similar dress in size 2T for the other sister/daughter in your family. My girls wore these on the same day and always reaped many compliments. Merry Christmas Bidders! I am glad you have chosen to bid on my quality items, a great way to save money on gifts this year and avoid the terrible traffic and weather conditions at the malls! Item.Name: DESIGNER QUAL. MERINO WOOL BLK PANTS M*GIFT
Item.Location: E. Coast FL, God Bless America!!
Item.Description: Georgia Satang 100% Merino Wool Pants Sophisticated blouse/shirt and bonus accessories! Classical elegance, this outfit can take you easily from meetings to dinner! The quality 100% Merino wool, fully lined pants are jet black, and appropriate for cold weather. They have an elegant cut, with 2 small (not exaggerated!) pleads on each side, straight cut leg (no cuff), front zipper closure, and diagonal pockets. The full lining is completely attached to the pants' hem (not just stitched here and there). In just-like-new condition, show no sign of wear, but just out of box so they might need a lint brush. Otherwise, perfect shape. They have a high end men's suit pants style cut. Very well made and elegant. The marked size is 12, but is a small 12 -- please check the measurements below: Waist: 28.5"-29" Length: 41" total - 29" inseam Leg width at bottom: 9.25" The blouse/shirt I am including in this auction, I have (gently) worn but is in very good shape as you can see from the look of the label in the closeup picture. No spots, holes, or any damage that I can see or find. I usually choose dry cleaning even where machine wash is allowed, and ALWAYS with shirts! Hate to iron! The only thing I can think of, is the first knot that acts as a button has been let out a bit to accommodate my fuller pregnant-woman breasts (sigh... where are they now??? lol) It is a feminine and not boring white shirt as I hope the pictures could show (both the pants and the shirt/blouse are very difficult to photograph due to the colors). It does not have a size label, but please check the measurements below. Shoulder to shoulder: 17" Bust: approx. 18.5" across (37" total) Sleeves: 21" Length: 20" I am throwing in the accessories shown in the pictures: a pair of black and white earrings and a faux pearl string but I usually wore with the blouse at the office. If you have any questions, I'll be glad and try to answer them. More boxes still to unpack here , more stuff still coming down from Manhattan! As I go through the stuff, with tears in my eyes and changing my mind 100 times, I must part with some of it that serve no purpose where I am now. So don't forget to check again my auctions in the coming weeks, for interesting (some REALLY interesting stuff) like (just a few examples): * GOLD LEATHER (LONG) EVENING GOWN * PURPLE BOA TRIM PANT SUIT * TIGRESS (TO DIE FOR!) SWING COAT/JACKET W/SKIRT * CRUISE FANCY GOTTEX BATHING SUIT * QUITE A FEW EVENING GOWNS AND CRUISE WARE DRESSES * INDIGO BLUE SUEDE FRINGED EVENING DRESS * LONG BLACK WINTER LEATHER COAT WITH FUR COLLAR * LIPSTICK RED SHEARED FUR COAT (maybe some other furs.. maybe lol) * POWDER BLUE LEATHER TALL BOOTS W/FRINGES * LEOPARD EXTRA!! TALL BOOTS and can't think just now... a lot more designer, boutique and unique items, a lot new some still with tags. Item.Name: awesome CALVIN KLEIN 3 btn blazer 42R 42 R
Item.Description: IMPORTANT NOTICE I will be on vacation from December 23rd through January 5th. For me to ship your item before I leave, payment in the form of Paypal or money order must be received by DECEMBER 22ND. Because I wait 7 days to ship on payments by check, I would need your check no later than December 15th to ship before I leave. Any checks received after the 15th or Paypal or money orders received after the 22nd will be mailed on the Monday and Tuesday after I return home which would be January 7th and 8th. I will have my laptop with me and will be answering all e-mails and sending out payment information on auctions that close while I'm gone. I will also be relisting items while I'm away. Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays! MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ON THIS ITEM If you are not entirely pleased with this item, just return it within 3 business days of receipt for a full refund less any shipping costs you incur (to you and back to me). Presenting a superb 3 button blazer from CK by Calvin Klein. The size is marked 43 regular and seems to measure out in the 42 regular range. Be sure and check the specific measurements below for all the details on fit. The fabric is 59% rayon, 47% wool and 4% nylon. It has nice woven texure. The weight leans slightly to cooler weather wear. The design is a herring bone weave. IOt has a predominent tuape vibe in terms of color. There weave is made up from taupe and black. The jacket is a 3 button single breasted style, fully lined and unvented. This jacket has a slightly more casual feel to it. It has bottom open patch pockets and would go terrific with khaki slacks for a nice casual look. The condition is excellent. No flaws of any kind. Here are the specific measurements: JACKET Sleeve (from shoulder hem to end of sleeve) 25 1/4" w/1 1/2" that could be let out. Shoulder (from shoulder hem to shoulder hem) 20" Length (from bottom of collar in back to bottom hem) 31" Chest (from side to side underneath arms while coat is laying down, then doubled) 46 1/2" Stomach (same measurement across the flaps of the pockets) 42 1/2". Some of my auctions may end during the day. Please be aware of this and bid early if you won't have access to the internet during the day. PLEASE READ ALL OF THE FOLLOWING BEFORE BIDDING: I use USPS Priority mail for shipping. For packages under 2 lbs, the cost is $3.95. 2-3 lbs. is $5.20, 3-4 is $6.45, 4-5 is $7.70. International bidders muct pay by Paypal, Bidpay, US cash or bank check drawn on a US bank in US dollars. For domestic buyers, I accept Paypal, checks and money orders. I will hold checks 7 days before shipping. Save on shipping costs by combining my other auctions. Please check out my other auctions of high end designer labels. My goal is to provide you with high quality bidding experience. Thank you for bidding and good luck! NOTE****Sometimes all of my photos do not load the 1st time.
